+
+$(BUILDTESTDIR)/DisallowedActions.ok: \
+                $(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/javatest.jar \
+		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/lib/jtreg.jar \
+		$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg
+
+	$(RM) $(@:%.ok=%)
+	$(MKDIR) $(@:%.ok=%)
+
+	$(JTREG_IMAGEDIR)/bin/jtreg $(JTREG_OPTS) \
+		-jdk:$(JDKHOME) \
+		-w $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ \
+		-r $(@:%.ok=%)/report/ \
+		$(TESTDIR)/disallowedActions/ > $(@:%.ok=%/jt.log) 2>&1 || \
+			true "non-zero exit code from jtreg intentionally ignored"
+
+	$(GREP) 'Disallowed test action: shell' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/ShellTest.jtr > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) 'Disallowed test action: applet' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/AppletTest.jtr > /dev/null
+	$(GREP) 'MainTest executed' $(@:%.ok=%)/work/MainTest.jtr > /dev/null
+
+	echo "$@ test passed at `date`" > $@
+
+
+TESTS.jtreg += $(BUILDTESTDIR)/DisallowedActions.ok
